name: Bravo56 NYC
address: 261 Dyckman St, New York, NY 10034, USA

reviews.text: Una experiencia de servicio y buen ambiente fenomenal, un trato c√°lido y de primera de todo su personal.

Great place
No food order

Located this restaurant while exploring the nearby park. I was a new restaurant in the area and the staff outside seemed friendly so I gave it a try. The serving staff were a bit green and unprofessional but tried. The bar tender needed more training. The drinks while nice to look at were not balance at all. They were either too sweet or made with too much alcohol, and I tried 4. The food however was on point. Well made, perfectly flavored and stylishly presented. This spot has a great deal of potential but requires much work. The floor all so added to my disappointment as they diminished the appearance of the place.
Muy Buen lugar para pasar un Bello rato

First time last night with my wife and loved it. Food, drinks, atmosphers, and service all great.
Went out the other night to Bravo56, good music and crowd.  Smoked hookah, had some good drinks, and had a great time!
Exactamente lo que deseaba, cumplieron todas mies expectativas

El peor lugar que yo eh ido en mi vida primero le dan la bebida ami marido en vaso plastico y al resto le dieron en vaso de cristal despues le dieron un salmon ami marido con salsa blanca y el fue muy claro de desirle en salsa Roja y por ultimo le dan una cuenta que no era de el y para comer esperaron que comieramos con los dedos porque tuvimos que Pedir los cubiertos terrible servicio jamas en mi vida volvemos a ese lugar‚Ä¶ y para que nos atendieran tuvimos que esperar 40 minutos ü§Æü§Æü§Æü§Æü§Æü§Æü§Æü§Æ
Good place to hang out but food (at least what I ordered) far from acceptable
Me encanta el bravo56 es mi segunda casa

The night we stumbled upon this gem for the first time felt like stepping into another world. As we were walking by, Kelvin‚Äîour soon-to-be server‚Äîliterally came outside to greet us and talk about the specials. That gesture alone set the tone for what would be an unforgettable evening.

From the start, the energy was infectious. The finger food was delicious and full of flavor, and the drinks? Let‚Äôs just say they don‚Äôt skimp on the pour‚Äîword to the wise: make sure you can hold your liquor!

What truly made the night special were Kelvin and Damian. Their vibe, attention, and hospitality made us feel like regulars, even though it was our first time there. The music was a vibrant mix of Spanish hits‚Äîperfect for anyone who loves a lively atmosphere with a little bit of everything on the playlist.

It‚Äôs not a fancy place, but it‚Äôs a fun place‚Äîand sometimes that‚Äôs exactly what you need. The kind of spot where the food, the drinks, the music, and the people all come together just right.

We‚Äôll definitely be coming back. If you're looking for a good time with great people, strong drinks, flavorful food, and music that'll have you moving, this is it.

Highly recommend!

Espa√±ol -
La noche en que nos topamos con esta joya por primera vez se sinti√≥ como entrar en otro mundo. Mientras camin√°bamos, Kelvin, quien ser√≠a nuestro mesero, sali√≥ literalmente a saludarnos y a contarnos sobre los especiales. Solo ese gesto marc√≥ el inicio de una buena velada.

Desde el principio, la energ√≠a era contagiosa. Los aperitivos estaban deliciosos y llenos de sabor, y las bebidas‚Ä¶ digamos que no escatiman en el alcohol, consejo: aseg√∫rate de poder aguantar el licor.

Lo que realmente hizo especial la noche fueron Kelvin y Damian. Su buena vibra, atenci√≥n y hospitalidad nos hicieron sentir como clientes de siempre, aunque era nuestra primera vez all√≠. La m√∫sica era una mezcla vibrante de √©xitos en espa√±ol, perfecta para quienes disfrutan de un ambiente animado con un poco de todo en la lista de reproducci√≥n.

No es un lugar elegante, pero s√≠ es un lugar para pasarla bien y a veces eso es justo lo que uno necesita. Un sitio donde la comida, las bebidas, la m√∫sica y la gente se combinan de forma perfecta.

Sin duda, vamos a volver. Si buscas un buen rato con buena gente, tragos fuertes, comida con sabor y m√∫sica que te hace moverte, este es el lugar.

¬°Muy recomendado!

One of the best spot in the highs Dyckman st. Live dj algenis one of the most popular dude I ever meet üòé lapolvora gave me a great attention dude is amazing with the lights games flash beating with the Music üî•

We've been to Bravo before and had fun, but our recent visit for a friend's birthday left us disappointed. Despite a reservation for 8, we were squeezed into a small area and told we needed to order five bottles to stay there. We moved to a different section with a 2 am deadline due to a performance. After ordering three bottles and some hookah, we were unexpectedly asked to move again, this time with specific bottle brand requirement for the area. It felt uncomfortable, and we noticed preferential treatment for a specific type of customer (DRUG DEALERS AND SCAMMERS). They should either keep their bottle special promotion as advertised or stop promoting it if they won't honor it. Bravos staff seemed more focused on profit than providing a welcoming experience to its customers. We obviously left and took our party to a different establishment in the area, and ended up ordering 7 bottles that night. Unsure we will return to Bravo definitely not recommending it to friends.

Truly wish I could give zero stars. Went to support this new spot and the happy hour was cute. The drinks were not consistent but for $5 I can‚Äôt complain.

Went Saturday night and immediately had to check our coats in‚Ä¶ but why were people inside wearing theirs? As soon as we enter, a waiter asks if we want a table, to which we reply that we wanna sit at the bar. He says there‚Äôs no room so we have to sit at a table, which he prepares for us. Then a bottle girl tells us we have to buy a bottle to sit at a table. Lol what? We just trying to have a beer and vibe to some music.

So‚Ä¶ as we originally wanted, we go to the bar. The bartender gives us our beers and when my friend went to close her tab, he was wild rude for no reason. The pen she was using to sign the check must have been the only pen in the entire place, cus the way he was shaking his head and rolling his eyes waiting for her to finish was crazy. She tipped him anyway so I hope he survived whatever he‚Äôs going through and I‚Äôm praying for him!

We left 10 mins after arriving cus there are 10000 other spots to choose from. Might stop by and give them a bag of pens just cus they‚Äôre down bad. 0/5 stars
